name: C++
description: C++ is a statically typed general-purpose language designed by Bjarne Stroustrup in 1985

resources.name: C++ - Video Playlist
pros: Teaches a large portion of the language's workings for best usage
Useful for absolute beginners as well as intermediate level

resources.name: cppreference.com
pros: Documentation about the entirety of the language and the standard library
Apt for everyone in the learning spectrum, from beginners to advanced users
cons: The site can become confusing and overwhelming to navigate

resources.name: C++ Core Guidelines
pros: Collection of best practices for most aspects of the language
Bite-sized titled entries, making it easy to navigate
Contains examples to take as guide
cons: Requires some prior understanding of the language

resources.name: Modernes C++
pros: Large series of blog posts about often less teached APIs and best practices
Very detailed explanations with explicit examples
Posts about new features less frequently found on the internet
cons: Requires intermediate-advanced knowledge of the language and its feature-set
